text: ─ Yeah, it suits you really well, Mikoto.

Since I received this outfit,
I've been thinking about fashion trends.

I've been wondering if there's something
I can incorporate into our stage performances.

So today, I think we can deliver a performance
that's different from before.

Is that so...! Then I'll pay attention to that aspect
during this live.

To the staff who made this outfit
and to you, Producer,

I want to make a stage that we
can both feel good about,
